tasks.task_description: Add volume mount for games storage

description: Add 200GB storage to Windows Docker container for game installation
context: Found compose.yml file with current Windows container configuration. Container has 32GB RAM, 8 CPU cores, and uses named volume 'windows-data' for storage.
Added DISK2_SIZE: "200G" environment variable to create a 200GB second disk for games.
Added games-data:/storage2 volume mount and created games-data volume definition. The second disk will appear as a separate drive in Windows.
Successfully restarted Windows container with new configuration. Created games-data volume and container is now running with 200GB second disk available.
